translation: Select a recording file to use.
source: Select a recording file to use.

translation: View the weapons and characters that appear in the story.
source: View the weapons and characters that appear in the story.

translation: Change Zero's outfit, Mikhail's appearance, or the background music.
source: Change Zero's outfit, Mikhail's appearance, or the background music.

translation: Checking current data.{LF}Do not turn off your PlayStation®3 system.
source: Checking current data.{LF}Do not turn off your PlayStation®3 system.

translation: Any unsaved progress will be lost.{LF}Return to the title screen?

translation: Deleting recording file.{LF}Do not turn off your PlayStation®3 system.
source: Deleting recording file.{LF}Do not turn off your PlayStation®3 system.

translation: Save data created by another user was loaded.{LF}This save data cannot be used.{LF}Overwrite this data and create new save data?
source: Save data created by another user was loaded.{LF}This save data cannot be used.{LF}Overwrite this data and create new save data?

translation: No current save data found.{LF}The system will create new save data.
